channel.title: Homepage on Michael Wong
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage on Michael Wong

item.description: I am a PhD student in economics at MIT specializing in labor and monetary economics. Broadly speaking, I am interested in how changing social institutions affect economic development. My approach combines fieldwork, quasi-experimental evidence, and economic theory to understand case studies. I am on the 2021-2022 academic job market and available for interviews. Here is my CV. You can reach me at mbwong@mit.edu.
